CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , comparing the photovoltaic performance of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) with PDTP - DTDPP(EH) suggests that the alkyl chain in the DPP segment has a large influence on the photovoltaic properties of the polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |
| alkyl chain |
| DPP segment |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be considered as material names, as they refer to specific types of polymers. The "alkyl chain" and "DPP segment" are not material names, but rather properties or components of the materials mentioned.
